name: FRALE TIDES Bridgeway
description:
<1000 words, very short kinetic novel!

Join a short carriage ride of a nameless passenger travelling to a city. She's had a hard life, and is unsure what they future will hold, or even this carriage ride...

I'll be updated it with voice within the day hopefully! Made for the game jam https://itch.io/jam/o2a2-again

cc music by -- https://soundcloud.com/scottbuckley/undertow-cc-by
